Process: Online referral form (see link to website)

Services:
Information line for anyone 
with experience of mental distress
Process: Call or text for details of Mind centres
Clients can call the freephone 24/7. Or they can drop in to the Oxford Circus Samaritans office for emotional support 9am-9pm everyday.

Clients: Rough sleepers in Lambeth, Southwark and Lewisham
Process: Phone for appointment. Clinic support available at various day centres across South London. Referrals also possible by phone or by sending off the following form: http://www.slam.nhs.uk/media/358263/START%20REFERRAL%20FORM.pdf
Call or email for enquiries. Self-referrals welcome.

Tel:
Advice Worker Lucy: 020 8644 4374 or 07516 175662 to make an appointment or by e-mail:
advice@rmns.org.uk.

Days: 09:30 – 18:00 on Mondays, Tuesdays, Thursdays and Fridays
Process: Call to book appointment, also make a referral
